Questions.Label: Regulations
Questions.Name: ind_1_principle

Questions.Label: Ensure that your GenAI usage and application follow the applicable institutional, national, international, and publishers' regulations and policies. In addition, identify and address potential ethical risks associated with your GenAI application in accordance with your ethical review board.
Questions.Name: ind_1_preparation

Questions.Label: Do the applicable regulations and policies allow for the use of GenAI tools in research in your work?
Questions.Name: ind_1

Questions.Label: Data security
Questions.Name: ind_2_principle

Questions.Label: To prevent compromising private or sensitive information when working with GenAI, you should (i) anonymise or pseudonymise all input data, (ii) opt out of data usage and storage in the GenAI application(s) where possible, and (iii) consult an expert on the topic of data security if needed. Whenever relevant, inform the participants how their data will be used in the GenAI application.
Questions.Name: ind_2_preparation

Questions.Label: Is your research using GenAI compatible with data privacy and security regulations?
Questions.Name: ind_2

Questions.Label: Quality Control
Questions.Name: ind_3_principle

Questions.Label: Quality Criteria
Questions.Name: ind_3_subprinciple

Questions.Label: Have predefined verifiable criteria for correctness, reasoning, relevance, and professional quality.
Questions.Name: ind_3_preparation

Questions.Label: Do you have specific quality criteria for the outputs of your GenAI tool?
Questions.Name: ind_3

Questions.Label: Quality Checks
Questions.Name: ind_4_subprinciple

Questions.Label:
A human contributor should assess whether the GenAI-generated outputs or their modified version satisfy previously set quality criteria.
Correctness: Is the output accurate and correct according to the set quality criteria?
Reasoning: Does the output make logical sense? Is it free of contradictions?
Relevance: Is the output relevant, comprehensive, and up-to-date according to human expertise?
Professional quality: Does the output satisfy all the other set quality expectations?
Questions.Name: ind_4_preparation

Questions.Label: Did a human contributor assess the outcomes by the set quality criteria and checks?
Questions.Name: ind_4

Questions.Label: Originality
Questions.Name: ind_5_principle

Questions.Label: Ensure that all components of the work, including text, data, figures, and images, are free from plagiarism in contexts where concerns of plagiarism apply. Make sure that the work of other parties is fully acknowledged and used in compliance with academic integrity.
Questions.Name: ind_5_preparation

Questions.Label: Did you make sure not to use someone elseâ€™s work without appropriate accreditation?
Questions.Name: ind_5

Questions.Label: Bias Mitigation
Questions.Name: ind_6_principle

Questions.Label: AI can create random or systematic biases. Ensure you systematically check whether your GenAI outputs reflect or perpetuate existing biases, power structures, stereotypes or biased consensus within society or academia, or introduce novel biases. Mitigate these biases where possible and relevant.
Questions.Name: ind_6_preparation

Questions.Label: Did you try to make sure that your project does not create, reflect or perpetuate biases or unfairness due to GenAI usage?
Questions.Name: ind_6

Questions.Label: Accountability
Questions.Name: ind_7_principle

Questions.Label: Make sure that you understand the GenAI output you are using and can explain it, so that you can accept accountability for its quality, originality, and fairness.
Questions.Name: ind_7_preparation

Questions.Label: Can you explain the GenAI output? Do you accept accountability for all resulting content?
Questions.Name: ind_7

Questions.Label: Transparency
Questions.Name: ind_8_principle

Questions.Label: Make sure that the process of using GenAI tools and their input to your work is documented and clearly communicated to the reader. Be clear about which tools and versions were used.
Questions.Name: ind_8_preparation

Questions.Label: Is the use of GenAI documented and reported transparently?
Questions.Name: ind_8

Questions.Label: Broader Impact
Questions.Name: ind_9_principle

Questions.Label: Be aware of the environmental and societal effects of GenAI usage and consider human labour as an alternative. Also, be aware that replacing human labour affects co-workers, juniors, or researchers of marginalised backgrounds who could be involved in and profit from your research.
Questions.Name: ind_9_preparation

Questions.Label: Are you aware of the social, economic, and environmental impacts that could arise from your GenAI use and have you considered alternatives?
Questions.Name: ind_9
